00043 Table::Table(PropertiesPtr &props, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager,
00044              Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, const String &name)
00045   : m_props(props), m_comm(conn_manager->get_comm()),
00046     m_conn_manager(conn_manager), m_hyperspace(hyperspace), m_not_found(false) {
00047 
00048   HT_TRY("getting table timeout",
00049     m_timeout_ms = props->get_i32("Hypertable.Client.Timeout"));
00050 
00051   initialize(name);
00052 
00053   m_range_locator = new RangeLocator(props, m_conn_manager, m_hyperspace,
00054                                      m_timeout_ms);
00055 }

00058 Table::Table(RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator, ConnectionManagerPtr &conn_manager,
00059     Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace, const String &name, uint32_t timeout_ms)
00060   : m_comm(conn_manager->get_comm()), m_conn_manager(conn_manager),
00061     m_hyperspace(hyperspace), m_range_locator(range_locator),
00062     m_timeout_ms(timeout_ms), m_not_found(false) {
00063 
00064   initialize(name);

00068 void Table::initialize(const String &name) {
00069   String tablefile = "/hypertable/tables/"; tablefile += name;
00070   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00071   uint64_t handle;
00072   HandleCallbackPtr null_handle_callback;
00073   String errmsg;
00074 
00075   // TODO: issue 11
00079   try {
00080     handle = m_hyperspace->open(tablefile, OPEN_FLAG_READ,
00081                                 null_handle_callback);
00082   }
00083   catch (Exception &e) {
00084     if (e.code() == Error::HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME)
00085       HT_THROW2(Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND, e, "");
00086     HT_THROW2F(e.code(), e, "Unable to open Hyperspace table file '%s'",
00087                tablefile.c_str());
00088   }
00089   m_table.name = strdup(name.c_str());
00090 
00094   value_buf.clear();
00095   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf);
00096 
00097   m_table.id = atoi((const char *)value_buf.base);
00098 
00102   value_buf.clear();
00103   m_hyperspace->attr_get(handle, "schema", value_buf);
00104 
00105   m_hyperspace->close(handle);
00106 
00107   m_schema = Schema::new_instance((const char *)value_buf.base,
00108       strlen((const char *)value_buf.base), true);
00109 
00110   if (!m_schema->is_valid()) {
00111     HT_ERRORF("Schema Parse Error: %s", m_schema->get_error_string());
00112     HT_THROW_(Error::BAD_SCHEMA);
00113   }
00114 
00115   m_table.generation = m_schema->get_generation();
00116 }

00119 Table::~Table() {
00120   free((void *)m_table.name);
00121 }

00124 TableMutator *Table::create_mutator(uint32_t timeout_ms) {
00125   return new TableMutator(m_comm, this, m_schema, m_range_locator,
00126                           timeout_ms ? timeout_ms : m_timeout_ms);
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00130 TableScanner *
00131 Table::create_scanner(const ScanSpec &scan_spec, uint32_t timeout_ms) {
00132   try {
00133     return new TableScanner(m_comm, this, m_schema, m_range_locator,
00134                             scan_spec, timeout_ms ? timeout_ms : m_timeout_ms);
00135   }
00136   catch (Exception &e) {
00137     if (e.code() == Error::TABLE_NOT_FOUND
00138         || e.code() == Error::RANGESERVER_TABLE_NOT_FOUND)
00139       m_not_found = true;
00140 
00141     throw; // some regression tests rely on the original what()
00142   }
00143 }
